titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1998, the duty on Fluridone aquatic herbicide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/2/1995--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on 1-methyl-3-phenyl-5- (3-(trifluoro-methyl) phenyl)-4(1 II)-pyridinone (Fluridone).
